subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Bud Collins, a 78-year-old sports writer and television personality, will not have his contract renewed by the network, making this his 35th and final Wimbledon with NBC.
snippet: Bud Collins, a 78-year-old sports writer and television personality, will not have his contract renewed by the network, making this his 35th and final Wimbledon with NBC.
